title: Tata Punch EV, Tiago EV get additional cash discounts after price cuts
description: Even after slashing prices for the Punch EV and Tiago EV by up to Rs 1.2 lakh and Rs 40,000, respectively, Tata Motors is offering significant benefits on both all-electric vehicles this month. Potential buyers can avail of direct cash, called Green Bonus, and corporate discounts, further reducing the amount they pay for a new Tata EV. Here’s how much you can save on these models this festive season. Tata Punch EV gets a cash discount worth Rs 20,000 Mid-spec Tiago EV variants get up to Rs 56,000 off Tata Punch EV Save up to Rs 26,000 Tata Motors dealers are offering a Rs 20,000 cash discount, along with corporate discounts of up to Rs 6,000, on the Citroen eC3 rival. This is for the MY2023 and MY2024 models. Just last month, the company cut prices of the EV, lowering them to Rs 9.99 lakh-13.79 lakh from Rs 10.99 lakh-14.99 lakh. The Punch EV comes with either a 35kWh battery with a 365km MIDC range or a 25kWh unit with up to 265km range. Tata Tiago EV Save up to Rs 56,000 The Tiago EV’s prices were also slashed last month. The all-electric hatchback now costs between Rs 7.99 lakh-10.99 lakh – a reduction of about Rs 40,000 for the top-spec variant. This month, the mid-spec XT variant with the larger 24kWh battery (275km of range) comes with cash discounts of up to Rs 50,000 and corporate discounts of up to Rs 6,000. Meanwhile, the entry-level Tiago EV XE and XT with the smaller 19.2kWh battery (up to 221km MIDC range) have cash discounts to the tune of Rs 10,000. html:
Tata dealers are offering a Green bonus and corporate discounts on the two EVs this month.

Even after slashing prices for the Punch EV and Tiago EV by up to Rs 1.2 lakh and Rs 40,000, respectively, Tata Motors is offering significant benefits on both all-electric vehicles this month. Potential buyers can avail of direct cash, called Green Bonus, and corporate discounts, further reducing the amount they pay for a new Tata EV. Here’s how much you can save on these models this festive season.

  1. Tata Punch EV gets a cash discount worth Rs 20,000
  2. Mid-spec Tiago EV variants get up to Rs 56,000 off

Tata Punch EV

Save up to Rs 26,000

Tata Motors dealers are offering a Rs 20,000 cash discount, along with corporate discounts of up to Rs 6,000, on the Citroen eC3 rival. This is for the MY2023 and MY2024 models. Just last month, the company cut prices of the EV, lowering them to Rs 9.99 lakh-13.79 lakh from Rs 10.99 lakh-14.99 lakh. The Punch EV comes with either a 35kWh battery with a 365km MIDC range or a 25kWh unit with up to 265km range.

Tata Tiago EV

Save up to Rs 56,000

The Tiago EV’s prices were also slashed last month. The all-electric hatchback now costs between Rs 7.99 lakh-10.99 lakh – a reduction of about Rs 40,000 for the top-spec variant. This month, the mid-spec XT variant with the larger 24kWh battery (275km of range) comes with cash discounts of up to Rs 50,000 and corporate discounts of up to Rs 6,000. Meanwhile, the entry-level Tiago EV XE and XT with the smaller 19.2kWh battery (up to 221km MIDC range) have cash discounts to the tune of Rs 10,000.
